title:
Ensure 'Windows Mobile Hotspot Service (icssvc)' is set
to 'Disabled'
description:
Provides the ability to share a cellular data connection with another device.
The recommended state for this setting is: Disabled.
rationale:
The capability to run a mobile hotspot from a domain-connected computer could easily
expose the internal network to wardrivers or other hackers.
impact: The Windows Mobile Hotspot feature will not be available.
audit_procedure:
Navigate to the UI Path articulated in the Remediation section and confirm it is set as
prescribed. This group policy setting is backed by the following registry location with a
REG_DWORD value of 4.
HKLM\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\icssvc:Start
remediation_procedure:
To establish the recommended configuration, run the following PowerShell command:
Set-Service -Name icssvc -StartupType Disabled
default_value:
Manual (Trigger Start)
